snippet.title: Pine Hearts Release Window Trailer | Wholesome Snack 2023
snippet.description: Pine Hearts is a cozy adventure by new publishing label, Little Nook. Explore the sleepy scenery of Pine Hearts Caravan Park in a story about fond memories and growing up, uncovering secrets, and new paths in a wholesome land of puzzles and adventure. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1781010/Pine_Hearts/ Watch the full Wholesome Snack 2023 showcase: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MJOLBlMKweI Links to every game: http://wholesomegames.com #indiegames #thegameawards #gaming
